contents.text: Welcome to Tray.io, the San Francisco-based citizen automation platform empowering you to integrate, automate, and innovate without developer resources.
If you need technical support for your workflows and integrations, press 1.
For assistance building and troubleshooting automations, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a workflow specialist.

navigationGoals: Get my failing data workflow resolved quickly
I need help fixing a broken workflow integration in my recruiting automation.
I need help debugging an integration workflow that’s failing due to authentication errors across connectors
I’m not very technical and need help troubleshooting my automation workflows that keep failing
I need help debugging my automation workflow that imports my experiment data into a spreadsheet.

contents.text: For help with our API and developer tools, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with an API expert.

navigationGoals: Fix authentication errors in my API integration before the deadline
I want guidance on authenticating and calling the Tray.io API for my service.
I want to optimize my API calls and review our OAuth token refresh implementation
I need assistance setting up and accessing my API key for developer tools
I want assistance integrating the Tray.io API with my lab’s data acquisition software.

contents.text: To learn about our platform and speak with sales, press 2.
To schedule a free demo with our sales engineers, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales engineer for your demo.

navigationGoals: Schedule a concise demo to evaluate Tray.io for our marketing automations
I’d like to schedule a demo to see how Tray.io can integrate with my veteran services database.
I’d like to arrange a sales engineer demo focusing on enterprise automation architecture and platform capabilities
I’d like to schedule a live demo to see how the platform works
I would like to schedule a demo to see how Tray.io could streamline my research data pipelines.

contents.text: For questions about billing or your account, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Clarify and correct an unexpected invoice charge on my account
I need to update my payment method and verify my current subscription details.
I need a detailed breakdown of our usage-based billing metrics and to dispute unexpected overage charges
I have questions about my bill and need to update my payment method
I have a question about the billing for my Tray.io account’s usage credits.
